items.d: The purpose of this class is to offer various validations for Manticore Search tables Currently we use it for fuzzy and autocomplete to check that in cacheable way that table has min_infix_len set
This is the parent class to handle erroneous queries via Manticore client requests
This is the parent class to format Manticore client responses as tables
This is just wrapper to hide Swoole to external plugins
The worker runner is processed in the following way. First, we call init method and after run.
The most important thing for this class you should call Task::init() first with runtime file and [init.php] Task::setSettings() with passed settings before you can use anything [main.php]
